Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy has taken over as manager of Wales after Rob Page was replaced.
Vincenzo Montella is the manager of Turkey.
Wales reached UEFA EURO 2020 and UEFA EURO 2024, as well as the FIFA World Cup in Qatar.
Turkey was involved in several entertaining games during UEFA EURO 2024, including beating Georgia 3-1 and Czechia 2-1.
Team News: Aaron Ramsey remains captain for Wales.
Chris Mepham is an injury concern for Wales.
Merih Demiral is suspended for Turkey.
Hakan Calhanoglu and Semih Kilicsoy are injury concerns for Turkey.
Ferdi Kadioglu is out injured for Turkey.
Predicted XI: Predicted Wales XI: Ward; Williams, Cabango, Rodon, Davies; James, Ampadu; Johnson, Ramsey, Thomas; Harris
Predicted Turkey XI: Gunok; Muldur, Bardakci, Soyuncu, Elmali; Yuksek, Ozcan; Yilmaz, Kokcu, Guler; Yildiz
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections are provided in the article.
